results.name: a(n) = 2^n - A006951(n).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: nmax = 60; 2^Range[0, nmax] - CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 - x^k)/(1 - 2*x^k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 21 2015
